title: Add Material Design icons and visual elements throughout docs
description: Add Material Design icons and visual elements to enhance documentation scanability. Use pymdownx.emoji (already configured) to add icons for features, tools, and sections. Reference .local/mkdocs-material for icon patterns. Apply to: homepage (feature cards), navigation sections, feature lists, tool categories, status badges. Story Points: 2. Dependencies: SOUL-174 (Homepage needs icons).
